remarks: The join of two atoms under a co-atom is strictly less than it. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jul-2013.)
statement:
lhp2lt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhp2lt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
lhp2lt.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
lhp2lt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhp2lt.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhp2lt $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( P .\/ Q ) .< W ) $.
